    • close

      public void close(boolean removeFromConnection) throws SQLException
      Closes the Statement and removes the object from the list of Statements kept in the FireboltConnection if the param removeFromConnection is set to true
      Parameters:
      removeFromConnection - whether the FireboltStatement must be removed from the parent FireboltConnection
      Throws:
      SQLException
